description: In convertHidlNanDataPathInitiatorRequestToLegacy, and convertHidlNanDataPathIndicationResponseToLegacy of hidl_struct_util.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID: A-143789898
